refnamediv.refpurpose: Lists all the regions that use one of the idents specified.

refsection.para: Lists all the regions that use one of the idents specified.
The example shows the use of the whichid command to list all the regions that use one of the specified idents.

info.title: List all regions having the specified idents.

example.para: Lists all regions having idents of 1002 or 1003.

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
